summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 7%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 921 m), feels like temperature (up 1.8°C), outside temperature (up 1.6°C), and inside temperature (up 1.9°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 571.6m higher than yesterday, 318.1m lower than the past week, 921.4m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 1837.2m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, the air will feel wet and humid. Drizzle or light rain possible, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
